meta.content: Website for East Jordan Public Schools

a.span: MI School Data Visit Our Dashboard

img.data-fbpg-desc: While EJPS buildings will remain closed to the public at this time, the elementary and middle-high school offices will be open Tuesdays and Fridays from 8am-1pm. Thank you for your understanding.

div.h1: Welcome to East Jordan Public Schools
div.p: East Jordan Public Schools, in partnership with students, parents and community aims to develop caring, inquiring and knowledgeable young people who possess the skills and character to achieve their highest potential and to be productive members of an ever changing society.

East Jordan Public Schools, in partnership with students, parents and community aims to develop caring, inquiring and knowledgeable young people who possess the skills and character to achieve their highest potential and to be productive members of an ever changing society.
